dataStructure.name: sid.org.tmforum.tip.cbe.policy.struct.stat.PolicyOperator
dataStructure.description:
This is a concrete class for modeling different types of operators in a PolicyStatement. By restricting the type of operator used in a PolicyStatement, one can effectively restrict the semantics of that PolicyStatement.

This entity is optional
dataStructure.label: PolicyOperator

child.name: opType
child.description:
This is an enumerated integer that specifies the various types of operators that are allowed for this PolicyStatement. Values include: 1: Match 2: Greater than 3: Greater than or equals 4: Less than 5: Less than or equals 6: Equals 7: Not equals 8: IN 9: NOT IN 10: SET 11: CLEAR

This element is generated from an attribute.

This attribute is optional
child.label: opType

child.name: policyVariable
child.description:
This element is generated from an association end.

This association end has multiplicity 0..*

This association end has aggregation none

This association end is navigable

This association end is an end of association OperatorConstraintDetails

This association end is optional
child.label: policyVariable
